item.title: AGL
item.description: score:85 Chances: Agilon Health has created an agilon Platform, a Total Care Model for community-based physicians, which could drive positive growth for the company. The firm’s focus exclusively on Medicare and management of comprehensive healthcare needs through subscription-like arrangements with health plans or directly with CMS shows potential for consistent revenue generation.
